servinfo.title: Engine Symptom Diagnosis
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Loose connection or disconnection of high-tension cord(s) or lead wire(s) (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine)

ps.ptxt: Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe
Air drawn in through intake manifold gasket or throttle body gasket

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

condition.ptxt: Engine hesitates – Momentary lack of response as accelerator is depressed. Can occur at all vehicle speeds. Usually most severe when first trying to make vehicle move, as from a stop sign
